title: Source of ELV supply
fullText:
Electrical installations or parts of electrical installations operating at ELV shall be in accordance with the relevant requirements of AS/NZS 3000.
Where an ELV supply is an accessory to an item of medical electrical equipment or is part of a medical electrical system, then a document shall be supplied with the equipment, e.g.â€”
(a)	in Australia, stating the ARTG number for that device; or
(b)	in New Zealand, stating the Medsafe certificate number for that device.
